Name: Ornn
Passive Description: Gain 1 max armour at the start of your turn
Ultimate Description: Choose up to 2 enemies in the current, or an adjacent, zone. Roll a dice for each enemy, ona 3+ that enemy is stunned

Name: Malphite
Passive Description: Gain 1 max armour at the start of your turn
Ability Description: Passive. Once per turn gain 1 max armour. Max 5
Ultimate Description:
Roll 2 dice and Stun enemy champions
1 - Fail
4 or below - 1 champion
5+ - 2 champions
8+ - 3 champions
12 - All enemies

Name: Shen
Passive Description: Gain 1 max armour at the start of your turn
Ultimate Description: Teleport Shen to the target zone a friendly champion 3 armour this turn

Name: Poppy
Passive Description: Gain 1 max armour at the start of your turn
Ultimate Description:
Roll 2 dice and eject enemy champions 2 zones away toward their base.
1 - Fail
4 or below - 1 champion
5+ - 2 champions
8+ - 3 champions
12 - All enemies

Name: Nocturne
Ultimate Description: Cross into an adjecent zone with an enemy champion present and become part of the battle. Nocturne must be the next champion you attack with and must attack this turn

Name: Fiddlesticks
Ability Description: Heal 1 for each enemy in the same zone. Max 2
Ultimate Description: Deal 1 damage to all enemies in the zone. Can be cast from an adjacent zone during a fight phase

Name: Sylas
Ultimate Description: Take and use the ultimate of one of the enemies in this zone

Name: Anivia
Passive Description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at the start of your turn
Ultimate Description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies in the zone

Name: Twisted Fate
Passive Description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at the start of your turn
Ability Description: Roll a dice. On a 6 choose to stun one enemy in this zone
Ultimate Description: Teleport up to 2 zones away. If a Battle phase is ongoing you may join but must attack last

Name: Zed
Passive Description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at the start of your turn
Ultimate Description: Roll a dice. Deal 2 + the result damage directly to target. This attack cannot be redirected by Tanks

Name: Vayne
Passive Description: At 4 items all hits are crits
Ability Description: Roll 3 dice. If all are 3+ deal 2 additional damage
Ultimate Description: Keep rolling a dice until you get a 2 or below. Deal 1 damage for each successful roll

Name: Jinx
Passive Description: At 4 items all hits are crits
Ability Description: Passive. If Jinx gets a killing blow she can attack again at the end of the fight phase

Name: Jhin
Passive Description: At 4 items all hits are crits
Ultimate Description: Roll 4 dice. Deal 1 damage for each 4+ rolled. If all 4 hit deal an additional 2 damage

Name: Ashe
Passive Description: At 4 items all hits are crits
Ability Description: Choose an enemy in the same zone. Reduce the number of additional hit dice they roll by 1
Ultimate Description: Roll a dice. On 3+ stun one enemy anywhere on the map

Name: Yuumi
Passive Description: Gains gold even when sharing a lane
Ability Description: Passive. If there is an ally in the zone Yuumi attaches to it and cannot be the target of any attacks
Ultimate Description: Roll a dice. Hit up to that many enemies and deal 1 damage. Those enemies have the number of additional hit dice by 1

Name: Soraka
Passive Description: Gains gold even when sharing a lane
Ability Description: Heal this champion or an ally in the same zone for 1 health

Name: Rakan
Passive Description: Gains gold even when sharing a lane

Name: Taric
Passive Description: Gains gold even when sharing a lane
Ability Description: Roll 2 dice. On 6+ stun one enemy of your choice. On 12 stun 2 enemies
Ultimate Description: Roll 2 dice. On a 12 prevent all allies from taking damage in this battle phase
